name: bulk-submit-status
title: Pathling Bulk Submit Status Operation
description: This operation allows checking the status of a bulk submission. Returns a status manifest containing information about the submission state, output files, and any errors.

parameter.name: submissionId
parameter.documentation: The unique identifier of the submission to check status for.

parameter.name: submitter
parameter.documentation: The identifier of the submitting system that created the submission.
